document.full_text: the leader of an islamist insurgency in the north caucasus said osama bin laden's death would not stop violence and hinted at more attacks, calling russia a "battleground" in an interview released on tuesday.
document.title: militant leader says all russia is a "battleground"
lines_and_colors: the leader of an islamist insurgency in the north caucasus said osama bin laden's death would not stop violence and hinted at more attacks, calling russia a "battleground" in an interview released on tuesday.
